mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BID,TITLE,WRITER,CONTENT) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(BID),0)+1 FROM BOARD),#{title},#{writer},#{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, WRITER=#{writer} WHERE BID=#{bid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' ORDER BY BID DESC
